title: Agnes Grey - last sentence of first paragraph

content.question: Unlike the rest of the paragraph, the last sentence of the first paragraph (“No wonder...departure”) does which of the following?

choices.label: Portrays the narrator’s difficulties in the household
Provides insight about Mrs. Bloomfield’s flaws

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
